definition: a middle way between two extremes, to settle by concession
details:
noun
- a middle way between two extremes
- an accommodation in which both sides make concessions
= example: an accommodation in which both sides make concessions
verb
- to settle by concession
- to make a compromise
= example: to make a compromise
- to expose or make liable to danger, suspicion, or disrepute
= example: to expose or make liable to danger, suspicion, or disrepute
